data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Guria.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guria, Georgia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Guria, Georgia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Guria, Georgia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Guria, Georgia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,923 believers in Guria, Georgia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Tajik people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Tajik people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Tajik people is yours.
Spirit, cause the 1,923 believers in Guria to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Guria who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guria, Georgia has a population of 141,800.

We estimate Guria has 1,923 people who might know Jesus, 112,165 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,712 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 73 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Guria, Georgia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
